summary: An ancient Nordic warhammer that no armor can protect against
descriptionHtml:
This here is my newest creation and first hammer weapon. It is two handed and craftable under daedric category as well as enchantable and temperable. The cube map gave it an amber hue since it was originally meant to be iron/steel colored but I thought it still looked ok so whatever. 

[youtube]jK7FDM9qTaE[/youtube]


My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
Shard Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18682
author: siberok92
